thread.title: Abbey Clancy struggles to keep her dress down on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet
thread.title_full: Abbey Clancy struggles to keep her dress down on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Abbey Clancy struggles to keep her dress down on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet
text:
Abbey Clancy struggles to keep her dress down on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet The Britain's Next Top Model stunner managed to avoid an embarrassing mishap Share     
Abbey Clancy managed to avoid an X-rated wardrobe malfunction on the Brit Awards red carpet. 
The Britain's Next Top Model babe stunned in a striking black and white dress that made sure to show off the leggy blonde's pins. 
With the length cut dangerously high, Abbey was forced to pull down on part of the gown in order to keep herself from flashing photogprahers. 
The gorgeous model kept her cool and still made sure to pose up a storm on the red carpet. Abbey had to hold her dress down (Photo: Rex Features) The model almost showed too much (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Rita Ora looks almost unrecognisable as she flaunts striking new look on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet 
Abbey wasn't the only star that found herself struggling to protect her modesty. 
Little Mix star Jade Thirlwall was left red-faced after her revealing dress accidentally flashed her skimpy black underwear on the red carpet. Jade suffered a wardrobe malfunction (Photo: Â©Karwai Tang) She didn't seem to notice as she posed for pictures (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Michelle Keegan, Abbey Clancy and Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall lead best dressed at BRIT Awards 2017 
As ever, fans in the UK can watch all the action on ITV with an exclusive broadcast, while Clara Amfo, Laura Jackson and Alice Levine will host live from the red carpet and backstage either side of the main show on ITV2. 
However, that's not all - the BRITs will also air live on YouTube at 7.30pm, which will be fronted by the platform's presenter-in-chief Casper Lee.
